body: I appreciate the story, but the action is actually pretty basic. Could've reveled in how great cocks are a bit more
@RICH & MARRIED RIOT FUJOSHI I'm bi, I'd love to either get fucked or pegged
Could've been longer but still awesome 👍
YOU'RE ALL FUCKING GAY. THAT'S IT. END OF DISCUSSION.

Typical douji from this dude. Hope he gets an epiphany and starts developing different stories and shit. His art is good but god damn it's the same shit al the time. 3/10. Futa gets a 8/10, would fuck and let fuck.

@I totally didn't fail NNN☑ Another way I can put it is that anything futanari is only "gay" if you yourself perceive it as gay. Can futa on female be considered gay since it's still woman and woman action? Probably. Can futa on male be considered as straight since it's still man and woman action? Probably, too. And of course, no one considers pegging "gay" unless if it involves lesbians.
Although art might not be this author's particular forte, it's still pretty good! Love the dialogue.

@The World>King Crimson .Actually the fact is that more people like the fact they have a dick because of the relatability factor, people here understand what its like to jerk off as a male and how it must feel like to have sex to an extent. But the female sensation is completely out of this world. Thats why some doujinshi may lose interest if the point of view is from a female, because again they have nothing to relate it to. Versus if this female had a dick, now we as readers can feel the story better and increase the immersion in the story.
Gay = liking men | Gay =/= liking dicks. There you go, you're all safe, now go get pegged

To answer what this doujin's implying, no, this ain't gay at all imo. From what I've observed, people who like this genre are only attracted to the futa's appearance and not their dicks. Basically think of this genre as an enhanced form of strap on play. Guys who are into girls with strap-ons aren't even attracted to other guys. Therefore, not gay.
